alert.note: Alert for Tioga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 6:35AM EST until December 20 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Binghamton NY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Pennsylvania...New York... Susquehanna River At Conklin affecting Susquehanna and Broome Counties. Susquehanna River At Vestal affecting Broome and Tioga Counties. Susquehanna River At Bainbridge affecting Chenango and Delaware Counties. Susquehanna River At Waverly/Sayre affecting Bradford and Tioga Counties. Tioughnioga River At Cortland affecting Cortland County. Beaver Kill At Cooks Falls affecting Sullivan and Delaware Counties. Oneida Creek At Oneida affecting Oneida and Madison Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING TO EARLY WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Susquehanna River at Waverly/Sayre. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning to early Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Flood stage. Widespread, but minor, flooding of the lowlands occurs along the river from the towns of Barton and Nichols, NY to the Athens Township, PA. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 AM EST Monday the stage was 6.5 feet. - Bankfull stage is 11.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 13.2 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 645 PM EST.
